# ENTITY::SET_ENTITY_USE_MAX_DISTANCE_FOR_WATER_REFLECTION

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **BOOL** useMaxDistance

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Set whether the entity should use the max distance check for being included in water reflections
